subject: Collabs
description_text:
Hello,


My name is Alessandro, and I’m a sim racing enthusiast.


I came across your haptic motors and would love to propose a few sponsored reels, an unboxing video, and possibly a YouTube review in exchange for a pair — or even just a single — of your vibration motors!


Here are the links to my social media pages that I manage:


  *   IG: https://www.instagram.com/alessandroteoli7?igsh=cjZnc3BoYWUydGVk&utm_source=qr
  *   FB: https://www.facebook.com/share/1DBkHatoWb/?mibextid=wwXIfr
  *   YT: https://www.youtube.com/@alessandroteoli


Looking forward to your response.

Have a great day!


Best regards,

Alessandro Teoli

conversations.body_text: Hi Alessandro Teoli,  Alright, I’ll discuss with my team whether we can provide a sample. Could you please share which brands you’re currently working with, and how their exposure and sales performance have been?

Hello,

I have collaboration with italian distributor of simagic, conspit, vnm, acelith and simnet

Inviato da Outlook per iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
Hi Alessandro Teoli,  Do you have the commission, order quantity, and sales amount data for May?

Italian distributor does not give me any commission! I just do for them reels on his page!

Inviato da Outlook per iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
Hi Alessandro Teoli,  We will discuss with our team and get back to you.
